00037 #ifndef _GNU_SOURCE
00038 #define _GNU_SOURCE
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 #include <stddef.h>
00042 #include <stdio.h>
00043 #include <stdlib.h>
00044 #include <string.h>
00045 #include <unistd.h>
00046 #include <sys/types.h>
00047 #include <sys/wait.h>
00048 #include <lnet/types.h>
00049 
00050 #ifndef HAVE_STRNLEN
00051 #define strnlen(s, i) strlen(s)
00052 #endif
00053 
00054 #define BLANK_LINE()                            \
00055 do {                                            \
00056         printf ("\n");                          \
00057 } while (0)
00058 
00059 #define COMMENT(c)                              \
00060 do {                                            \
00061         printf ("        /* "c" */\n");         \
00062 } while (0)
00063 
00064 #define STRINGIFY(a) #a
00065 
00066 #define CHECK_DEFINE(a)                                                 \
00067 do {                                                                    \
00068         printf ("        CLASSERT ("#a" == "STRINGIFY(a)");\n");        \
00069 } while (0)
00070 
00071 #define CHECK_VALUE(a)                                  \
00072 do {                                                    \
00073         printf ("        CLASSERT ("#a" == %d);\n", a); \
00074 } while (0)
00075 
00076 #define CHECK_MEMBER_OFFSET(s,m)                \
00077 do {                                            \
00078         CHECK_VALUE((int)offsetof(s, m));       \
00079 } while (0)
00080 
00081 #define CHECK_MEMBER_SIZEOF(s,m)                \
00082 do {                                            \
00083         CHECK_VALUE((int)sizeof(((s *)0)->m));  \
00084 } while (0)
00085 
00086 #define CHECK_MEMBER(s,m)                       \
00087 do {                                            \
00088         CHECK_MEMBER_OFFSET(s, m);              \
00089         CHECK_MEMBER_SIZEOF(s, m);              \
00090 } while (0)
00091 
00092 #define CHECK_STRUCT(s)                         \
00093 do {                                            \
00094         BLANK_LINE ();                          \
00095         COMMENT ("Checks for struct "#s);       \
00096         CHECK_VALUE((int)sizeof(s));            \
00097 } while (0)
00098 
00099 void
00100 check_lnet_handle_wire (void)
00101 {
00102         CHECK_STRUCT (lnet_handle_wire_t);
00103         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_handle_wire_t, wh_interface_cookie);
00104         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_handle_wire_t, wh_object_cookie);
00105 }
00106 
00107 void
00108 check_lnet_magicversion (void)
00109 {
00110         CHECK_STRUCT (lnet_magicversion_t);
00111         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_magicversion_t, magic);
00112         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_magicversion_t, version_major);
00113         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_magicversion_t, version_minor);
00114 }
00115 
00116 void
00117 check_lnet_hdr (void)
00118 {
00119         CHECK_STRUCT (lnet_hdr_t);
00120         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_hdr_t, dest_nid);
00121         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_hdr_t, src_nid);
00122         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_hdr_t, dest_pid);
00123         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_hdr_t, src_pid);
00124         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_hdr_t, type);
00125         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_hdr_t, payload_length);
00126         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_hdr_t, msg);
00127 
00128         BLANK_LINE ();
00129         COMMENT ("Ack");
00130         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_hdr_t, msg.ack.dst_wmd);
00131         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_hdr_t, msg.ack.match_bits);
00132         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_hdr_t, msg.ack.mlength);
00133 
00134         BLANK_LINE ();
00135         COMMENT ("Put");
00136         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_hdr_t, msg.put.ack_wmd);
00137         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_hdr_t, msg.put.match_bits);
00138         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_hdr_t, msg.put.hdr_data);
00139         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_hdr_t, msg.put.ptl_index);
00140         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_hdr_t, msg.put.offset);
00141 
00142         BLANK_LINE ();
00143         COMMENT ("Get");
00144         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_hdr_t, msg.get.return_wmd);
00145         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_hdr_t, msg.get.match_bits);
00146         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_hdr_t, msg.get.ptl_index);
00147         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_hdr_t, msg.get.src_offset);
00148         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_hdr_t, msg.get.sink_length);
00149 
00150         BLANK_LINE ();
00151         COMMENT ("Reply");
00152         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_hdr_t, msg.reply.dst_wmd);
00153 
00154         BLANK_LINE ();
00155         COMMENT ("Hello");
00156         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_hdr_t, msg.hello.incarnation);
00157         CHECK_MEMBER (lnet_hdr_t, msg.hello.type);
00158 }
00159 
00160 void
00161 system_string (char *cmdline, char *str, int len)
00162 {
00163         int   fds[2];
00164         int   rc;
00165         pid_t pid;
00166 
00167         rc = pipe (fds);
00168         if (rc != 0)
00169                 abort ();
00170 
00171         pid = fork ();
00172         if (pid == 0) {
00173                 /* child */
00174                 int   fd = fileno(stdout);
00175 
00176                 rc = dup2(fds[1], fd);
00177                 if (rc != fd)
00178                         abort();
00179 
00180                 exit(system(cmdline));
00181                 /* notreached */
00182         } else if ((int)pid < 0) {
00183                 abort();
00184         } else {
00185                 FILE *f = fdopen (fds[0], "r");
00186 
00187                 if (f == NULL)
00188                         abort();
00189 
00190                 close(fds[1]);
00191 
00192                 if (fgets(str, len, f) == NULL)
00193                         abort();
00194 
00195                 if (waitpid(pid, &rc, 0) != pid)
00196                         abort();
00197 
00198                 if (!WIFEXITED(rc) ||
00199                     WEXITSTATUS(rc) != 0)
00200                         abort();
00201 
00202                 if (strnlen(str, len) == len)
00203                         str[len - 1] = 0;
00204 
00205                 if (str[strlen(str) - 1] == '\n')
00206                         str[strlen(str) - 1] = 0;
00207 
00208                 fclose(f);
00209         }
00210 }
00211 
00212 int
00213 main (int argc, char **argv)
00214 {
00215         char unameinfo[256];
00216         char gccinfo[256];
00217 
00218         system_string("uname -a", unameinfo, sizeof(unameinfo));
00219         system_string("gcc -v 2>&1 | tail -1", gccinfo, sizeof(gccinfo));
00220 
00221         printf ("void lnet_assert_wire_constants (void)\n"
00222                 "{\n"
00223                 "        /* Wire protocol assertions generated by 'wirecheck'\n"
00224                 "         * running on %s\n"
00225                 "         * with %s */\n"
00226                 "\n", unameinfo, gccinfo);
00227 
00228         BLANK_LINE ();
00229 
00230         COMMENT ("Constants...");
00231 
00232         CHECK_DEFINE (LNET_PROTO_RA_MAGIC);
00233 
00234         CHECK_DEFINE (LNET_PROTO_TCP_MAGIC);
00235         CHECK_DEFINE (LNET_PROTO_TCP_VERSION_MAJOR);
00236         CHECK_DEFINE (LNET_PROTO_TCP_VERSION_MINOR);
00237 
00238         CHECK_VALUE (LNET_MSG_ACK);
00239         CHECK_VALUE (LNET_MSG_PUT);
00240         CHECK_VALUE (LNET_MSG_GET);
00241         CHECK_VALUE (LNET_MSG_REPLY);
00242         CHECK_VALUE (LNET_MSG_HELLO);
00243 
00244         check_lnet_handle_wire ();
00245         check_lnet_magicversion ();
00246         check_lnet_hdr ();
00247 
00248         printf ("}\n\n");
00249 
00250         return (0);
00251 }
